Class RegistrationAuthority

java.lang.Object
core.RegistrationAuthority
public class RegistrationAuthority extends Object
Represents the Registration Authority in the e-voting system.

  • Maintaining the list of eligible voters
  • Issuing X.509 certificates to authenticated voters
  • Sharing eligible voter information with the Voting Server
  • Managing certificate revocation through a Certificate Revocation List (CRL)

The Registration Authority operates primarily during the registration phase of an election, as managed by the ElectionManager.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationAuthority

      public RegistrationAuthority(ElectionManager electionManager) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructs a new Registration Authority with the specified election manager.
      Parameters:
      electionManager - The election manager for phase control
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the RSA algorithm is not available

  • Method Details

    • registerEligibleVoter

      public boolean registerEligibleVoter(String voterId)
      Registers a voter as eligible to participate in the election.

      This method can only be called during the registration phase.

      Parameters:
      voterId - The unique identifier of the voter
      Returns:
      true if the voter was successfully registered, false if already registered
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If not in the registration phase

    • removeEligibleVoter

      public boolean removeEligibleVoter(String voterId)
      Removes a voter from the list of eligible voters.
      Parameters:
      voterId - The unique identifier of the voter
      Returns:
      true if the voter was removed, false if not found

    • issueCertificate

      public X509Certificate issueCertificate(Voter voter) throws org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException, CertificateException
      Issues an X.509 certificate to an eligible voter.

      This method can only be called during the registration phase.

      Parameters:
      voter - The voter object containing identification and public key
      Returns:
      A signed X.509 certificate
      Throws:
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - If there's an error creating the certificate
      CertificateException - If there's an error with the certificate
      IllegalStateException - If not in the registration phase
      SecurityException - If the voter is not eligible

    • shareEligibleVotersListWithVotingServer

      public void shareEligibleVotersListWithVotingServer(VotingServer votingServer)
      Shares the list of eligible voters with the voting server.
      Parameters:
      votingServer - The voting server to update

    • exportEligibleVotersList

      public void exportEligibleVotersList(String filePath) throws IOException
      Exports the list of eligible voters to a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to save the file
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error writing to the file

    • revokeCertificate

      public boolean revokeCertificate(String serialNumber, String reason)
      Revokes a certificate by adding it to the Certificate Revocation List.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the certificate to revoke
      reason - The reason for revocation
      Returns:
      true if the certificate was revoked, false otherwise
